snippet: The Iowa Democratic Party is changing the name of the annual event because Thomas Jefferson and Andrew Jackson owned slaves.
abstract: Iowa Democratic Party votes to change name of Jefferson-Jackson dinner in bid to distance party from slave-owning legacies of Thomas Jefferson and Andrew Jackson, who also led brutal campaign against Native Americans; move comes as other state party committees have taken similar actions.
lead_paragraph: The Iowa Democratic Party is changing the name of the annual event because Thomas Jefferson and Andrew Jackson owned slaves.
